column5: ...if buying a new snowblower would gaurantee no snow...I'd buy a new one every year...
Here's the latest.  This is my favourite radar site.  http://www.weatheroffice.gc.ca/radar/index_e.html?id=WSO  muddler

A very localized area of lake effect snow is hitting the St Catharines corridor on the QEW and is going to get worse...up to 30 cm of snow with whiteouts. I know thats not much for you northern or snow belt guys, but we don't usually get that much and don't really have the equipment to handle it. Be careful on the highways!

Localized eh,    well it's just a blasting away up here around Barrie too,  pretty wicked whiteouts and drifting,  drive down the roads and come back 15 minutes later,  no evidence of previous tracks.
Pfftt..you Barrie guys get this crap all the time. This will shut the city down here.
Memories of '77, eh? That was one heck of a storm too! Stay safe and warm if you can.
Nothing in Grimsby yet, hopefully the squalls don't materialize.
Look out solo...lol http://www.theweathernetwork.com/weather/m...qlink_obs_radar
Clear as could be up here today. -30C, but nice and clear..
Nothing in Hamilton.

I know this isn't very Christian of me but BETTER YOU THAN ME!  Light fluries here again today and winds gusting up to 40 k earlier. I would have liked to get out and try some more fishing but not in these conditions.  Hope those that are affected by the storms are safe and sound!
you could drill a hole through the ice at midfield in Ralph Wilson Stadium right now.I think the Colts have gone fishin.
snowing and blowing here can't even see the lake.

Lots of fluffy white stuff in Beamsville.  Perfect weather for cutting and stacking wood with the son.  Have gotten so much achieved with my puter down. Be a few days before I'm back online, so more time for essential chores.

Londons been getting hit for the most part since new years day and we don't have half the snow that the Strathroy area has gotten They've gotten it non-stop since then and it seems theres no letting up yet.  jjcanoe

i dont understand how you people can say you got snow.....cuz its all up here ....our snowbanks have went from less then 2 feet to almost 6 feet in two days ...i am so relieved my snowblower is working again ...
Nothing out here......just a little bit of blowing snow. I want to get snowed in........bring it on!  S.
Just a dusting here in Grimsby. My sources say maybe 5cm overnight.
Sure wish we could get some...all it is here is cold
Had the snowblower out once already today, might need to get out in the morning and do it again, lol
Snow-Day! - Snow Day! - Snow-Day! - Snow Day! Jim
We don't get snow days..you are expected to be there...big deal...a bit of snow
about 5 or 6 cm here, its really light snow, the fluffy kind that is fun to play in lol  Cheers!

Well..my vehicle doesn't say John Deere on the side of it. Snow day was good...even though the highway was closed for awhile cause they couldn't get a handle on the black ice. Just a few dozen minor accidents luckily. Still snowing though...
I'm in Fonthill, snowed all last night - right now probably 10" on the ground.  I hope the snow blower is working!!   "work is for those who don't know how to fish"
Maybe 2cm max in Grimsby.
It's my fault Solo, I treated myself to a snowblower this year.  I actually was hoping to use it this time
